DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine effect 12 week WB-EMS either applicated passive supine rest position active slight movement compare non-training control group body composition , muscle strength QoL patient ulcerative colitis . Our main hypothesis active WB-EMS application significantly favorable address primary endpoint compare passive application . Our secondary hypothesis passive WB-EMS application significantly favorable address primary endpoint compare non-training control .
DOC.criteria: ulcerative colitis ambulatory subject variables conflict WBEMS application ( e.g . cardiac pacemaker ) absence two week interventional period .
